mapper.insert: insert into product_like (li_user_id, li_bno, li_status) values (#{liUserId}, #{liBno}, #{liStatus} - 2)
mapper.update: update product_like set li_status = li_status + #{liStatus}, li_reg_at = now() where li_user_id = #{liUserId} and li_bno = #{liBno}
mapper.select: select li_status from product_like where li_bno = #{proBno} and li_user_id = #{memEmail}
